name: SLEEPING ON THE JOB
description:
Game Info:
You're the average office worker, 9-5, 5 days a week, your boss tells you on Friday that you need to come into work tomorrow. To escape the mundane office you fall asleep at your desk only to find out you never left. Escape the office and find a fulfilling job.

Controls:
W A S D or ARROW KEYS to move
Use the MOUSE to aim your weapon

Credits:
Project completed in 3 days, by 3 people  (All original assets)
